name: Dream Catcher (itch) (mas_que)
description:
v0.1 of an STG I'm making, partially because I like Hellsinker/Touhou etc, partially because they aren't hard to get to playable state, and mainly to learn the logic of make game

CONTROLS:

Z - Select/Fire

C - Bomb

ARROW KEYS - Move Around

Shift - Move, but slower
